title: The Male God Become Coquettish After Marriage - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Arranged Marriage   Child Abuse   Clingy Lover   Death of Loved Ones   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Divorce   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Marriage   Mismatched Couple   Mpreg   Older Love Interests   Omegaverse   Showbiz   Shy Characters   Suicides   Timid Protagonist   Tragic Past
author: K TFaith
description:
Huai Xingye had never thought about marriage, let alone coming home one day and being told he was getting married.

He dyed his hair, got into fights, wore earrings, and was a ‘punk’ in the eyes of many people, so he couldn’t imagine which family would want such a daughter-in-law.

He scoffed in his heart, but the marriage partner’s mother was too good to him, so Huai Xingye put away his sharp edges and treated her with respect.

But he didn’t understand, what happened when the marriage partner ran away on the wedding night?

Later he learned – the marriage partner Wei Xulan is a star, who have a lot of younger sister and wife.

The first day of their relationship, the two are polite and distant.

———

Wei Xulan: “You sleep on the bed.”

Huai Xingye: “No, you sleep on it.”

Wei Xulan: “How can I let you sleep in the living room? You sleeping here is fine.”

Huai Xingye: “…… thanks.”

Wei Xulan: “You’re welcome.”

Later, Wei Xulan, known as the high cold male god, actually also learned to pamper him ……>
